## Introduction to the DMP Assistant

Now that we've gone through the basic structure and questions of a DMP, we're now going to do a walk through of the DMP Assistant, which we'll be using throughout the program.  

<a href="https://dmp-pgd.ca/">DMP Assistant</a>


In this tutorial, we'll cover the following:

* Create a new DMP using the UVic template
* Explore the various functions of the DMP Assistant, including:
    * Project details
    * Sharing and adding contributors
    * Linking a DMP to research outputs
    * Downloading the final document
    * Writing the plan
